Fault.name: C:\JDeveloper1213\mywork\WingPOS\ExpeditorShipping\SOA\composite.xml
Fault.msg: The service "TrackingNumberPolling" exposed by component "UpdateShipmentProcess" is not wired to/used by any other component.

Fault.name: BPEL/UpdateShipmentProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that the expression in <bpel:condition> is a boolean expression.
Fault.msg: The expression count($GetTrackingNumber_OutputVariable.Tracking ... in <bpel:condition> is not a boolean expression.

Fault.name: BPEL/TrackingNumberPollingProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns4:SbcExpeditorShipconfirm" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
